name: spelon-berry
effect: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.
short_effect: Used for creating PokéBlocks and Poffins.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow SPELON.
flavor_text.emerald: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow SPELON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Can be ground up into a powder as an ingredient for medicine.
